languages.text: "А не то что? Колошматить-то Лорд-капитан запретил{mf||а}, Император храни {mf|его|ее} душу! Орать будешь? Ну, ори, начальник смены на меня тоже орет, я привык".

"Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."
languages.original_text: "А не то что? Колошматить-то Лорд-капитан запретил{mf||а}, Император храни {mf|его|ее} душу! Орать будешь? Ну, ори, начальник смены на меня тоже орет, я привык".

traits.locale_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

"Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

"Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

"Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

"Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

languages.text: “否则怎么样？你可不能打我，这是舰长大人的命令！愿神皇保佑{mf|他|她}的灵魂！你打算朝我大喊大叫吗？那你尽管喊吧。我的领班总是对我大喊大叫，我已经习惯了。”
languages.original_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

traits.locale_text: “否则怎么样？你可不能打我，这是舰长大人的命令！愿神皇保佑{mf|他|她}的灵魂！你打算朝我大喊大叫吗？那你尽管喊吧。我的领班总是对我大喊大叫，我已经习惯了。”

languages.text: «¿O si no, qué? ¡No tiene permiso para darme una paliza, lo ha prohibido {mf|el mismísimo|la mismísima} Lord Capitán, que el Dios Emperador guarde su alma! ¿Qué va a hacer, gritarme? No se corte, que mi capataz ya me chilla todos los días y me he acostumbrado».
languages.original_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

traits.locale_text: «¿O si no, qué? ¡No tiene permiso para darme una paliza, lo ha prohibido {mf|el mismísimo|la mismísima} Lord Capitán, que el Dios Emperador guarde su alma! ¿Qué va a hacer, gritarme? No se corte, que mi capataz ya me chilla todos los días y me he acostumbrado».

languages.text: 「さもなければ？私をそんな風に怒鳴る権利なんてない！ロード・キャプテンの命令こそが全てだ。神帝陛下が魂を守ってくれる！まだ怒鳴るのか？勝手にしろ！怒鳴られるのなんて慣れている！」
languages.original_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

traits.locale_text: 「さもなければ？私をそんな風に怒鳴る権利なんてない！ロード・キャプテンの命令こそが全てだ。神帝陛下が魂を守ってくれる！まだ怒鳴るのか？勝手にしろ！怒鳴られるのなんて慣れている！」

languages.text: "Sonst was?" Ihr dürft mich nicht schlagen ... Befehl des Lord Captains, möge der Gottimperator {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seele gnädig sein! Schreit Ihr mich jetzt an? Nur zu, mein Vorarbeiter schreit mich auch immer an, das bin ich gewohnt."
languages.original_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

traits.locale_text: "Sonst was?" Ihr dürft mich nicht schlagen ... Befehl des Lord Captains, möge der Gottimperator {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seele gnädig sein! Schreit Ihr mich jetzt an? Nur zu, mein Vorarbeiter schreit mich auch immer an, das bin ich gewohnt."

languages.text: « Sinon quoi ? Vous avez interdiction de me frapper, ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, l'Empereur-Dieu ait son âme ! Vous allez faire quoi, me crier dessus ? Allez-y donc, j'ai l'habitude, mon contremaître m'aboie ses ordres à la face à longueur de journée. »
languages.original_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."

traits.locale_text: « Sinon quoi ? Vous avez interdiction de me frapper, ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, l'Empereur-Dieu ait son âme ! Vous allez faire quoi, me crier dessus ? Allez-y donc, j'ai l'habitude, mon contremaître m'aboie ses ordres à la face à longueur de journée. »

languages.text: "Yoksa ne? Beni öyle kafana göre pataklayamazsın. Lord Kaptan'ın emri bu. Tanrı İmparator ruhunu korusun! Bana bağıracak mısın? Bağır. Ustabaşılardan yeterince azar yiyorum ben, alışkınım."
languages.original_text: "Or else what? You're not allowed to clobber me — Lord Captain's orders, God-Emperor preserve {mf|his|her} soul! Are you gonna yell at me? Yell away, I get plenty of that from my foreman, I'm used to it."
